S

schedule(double) - Method in class simj.SimEvent
Schedules this event at a given time.
set(boolean) - Method in class simj.SimLogger
Enables or disables the detailed logging for the current simulation.
setMaxItems(int) - Static method in class supermarket.Client
Sets the maximum number of articles a client can buy.
setupSimulation() - Method in class simj.SimSimulation
Does some additional simulation initialization configuration.
setupSimulation() - Method in class supermarket.SuperMarche
Does some additional initialisation configurations for the Supermarket.
SimEntity - Class in simj
This class allows for the creation of the simpliest possible temporary entity, its single feature being its ID.
SimEntity(int) - Constructor for class simj.SimEntity
Constructs a SimEntity object.
SimEntityFactory - Class in simj
This singleton class implements an entity factory.
SimEntityFactory() - Constructor for class simj.SimEntityFactory
Protected constructor to avoid external instantiation of this singleton class.
SimEvent - Class in simj
This class implements the generic concept of a discrete event.
SimEvent(double) - Constructor for class simj.SimEvent
Constructs a SimEvent object.
SimEventEndService - Class in simj
This class implements the discrete event, which consists of ending serving an entity at a given resource.
SimEventEndService(SimResource, SimEntity, double) - Constructor for class simj.SimEventEndService
Constructs a SimEventEndService object.
SimEventResource - Class in simj
This class implements the generic concept of a discrete event associated with the request or the relinquish of a resource by a temporary entity.
SimEventResource(SimResource, double) - Constructor for class simj.SimEventResource
Constructs a SimEventResource object.
SimEventScanResources - Class in simj
This class implements an event, which schedules itself every interval and prints the status (# being served and # waiting) for each resource.
SimEventScanResources(double) - Constructor for class simj.SimEventScanResources
Constructs a SimEventScanResources object.
SimEventStartService - Class in simj
This class implements the discrete event, which consists of starting serving an entity at a given resource.
SimEventStartService(SimResource, double) - Constructor for class simj.SimEventStartService
Constructs a SimEventStartService object.
simj - package simj
 
simj.util.logging - package simj.util.logging
 
SimJFormatter - Class in simj.util.logging
This class implements a simple text formatter for log records.
SimJFormatter() - Constructor for class simj.util.logging.SimJFormatter
 
SimLogger - Class in simj
This singleton class implements a logging service.
SimRandom - Class in simj
This singleton class has features for producing random numbers.
SimResource - Class in simj
This class implements the generic concept of a resource.
SimResource(int, String) - Constructor for class simj.SimResource
Constructs a resource.
SimScheduler - Class in simj
This class maintains the current time and has features for inserting new events or for finding the next event in the event list or future event chain (FETCH).
SimSimulation - Class in simj
This class manages the simulation event loop, and provides features for initializing the simulation (that is, creating and providing the unique scheduler and randomizer, creating and registering resources, setting the simulation end time,...).
SimSimulation(double, int, boolean) - Constructor for class simj.SimSimulation
Protected (to avoid external instantiation) constructor of the general simulation class.
startServing(SimEntity) - Method in class simj.SimResource
Start serving an entity.
startSimulation() - Method in class simj.SimSimulation
Initializes and starts the simulation.
SuperMarche - Class in supermarket
This class implements a supermarket.
SuperMarcheFrame - Class in supermarket
This class implements a GUI for entering the several parameters needed to simulate a supermarket.
SuperMarcheFrame() - Constructor for class supermarket.SuperMarcheFrame
Creates new form SupermarcheFrame.
supermarket - package supermarket
